mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WINENEWS (newsCode, newsTitle, newsWriter, newDate, newsStatus, newsViews, memberCode) VALUES (#{newsCode}, #{newsTitle}, #{newsWriter}, #{newsDate}, #{newsStatus}, #{newsViews}, #{memberCode})

INSERT INTO WINEKNOW (knowCode, knowTitle, knowWriter, knowDate, knowStatus, knowViews, memberCode) VALUES (#{knowCode}, #{knowTitle}, #{knowWriter}, #{knowDate}, #{knowStatus}, #{knowViews}, #{memberCode}s)
